descriptionHtml:
***************************************************************************************
!Wellcome to the drugs party!

U can see the fantastic mead and skoom!

If u drink blackbriarmead,
your weapon speed faster than before and you got nighteyes until its duration .
but you don\'t move fast.
skooma is same blackbriarmead, but effect is better than blackbriarmead.
Please, refrain from taking drug, because skooma is a highly addictive substance.
bye,there


\\installation\\

extract and put in data folder.

Fixed left weapon speed.
